礚字的基本解释

礚
kē
古同“磕”，象声词：“惮涌湍之礚礚兮，听波声之汹汹。”

礚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kē］
［《集韻》丘蓋切，去泰，溪。］
(1)象声词。
(2)撞击。
(3)用于地名。

礚字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　礚； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页837第47
【集韻】同磕。【說文】硠礚，石聲。　又下礚，地名。【北史·李璨傳】宋將張永沈攸之等先屯下礚。　又叶去例切，音器。【司馬相如·子虛賦】礧石相擊，硠硠礚礚。叶上會下外。　又叶口盍切，音榼。【揚雄·羽獵賦】?駍駖礚。叶上轕下岋。

礚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
礚字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
礚
kē
The ancient same "knock", onomatopoeia: "The turbulent turbulent swelling, listening to the fierce waves."
礚

[①]［kē］
["Jiyun" Qiu Gaiqie, go to Tai, Xi. ]
(1) Onomatopoeia.
(2) Impact.
(3) Used for place names.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　礚; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 837-47
【Ji Yun】Same knock. [Speaking text] 硠礚, stone sound.　Xiazhu again, place name. [Northern History·Li Can's Biography] Song general Zhang Yong, Shen Youzhi, etc. were first stationed in the village.　 Ye go to the case cut again, the sound instrument. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】Strike against each other with stone and stone, and 硠硠礚礚. The leaves will go down.　I cut the mouth of the leaf again, and the sound. 【Yang Xiong·Yu Hunting Fu】? The leaves are on the lower side.
